name: Harmony
description: Harmony is the one thing that everyone wants to enjoy with their family on a day of celebration. This inspired us to create this arrangement of Roses and Callas with its perfect two-colour balance, red from chrysanthemums, roses and hypericum and white from more chrysanthemums calla lilies and salix. Share a feeling of peace and harmony just in time for the any occasion with this serene winter bouquet!
